sentences.en: Announcer: Scotland and Northern Ireland will probably have sunshine all day.
sentences.cn: 广播员: 明天英格兰和北爱尔兰或许一整天天气晴朗.

sentences.en: He is recognized to be a qualified announcer.
sentences.cn: 他被认为是合格的播音员.

sentences.en: The announcer , with rich dramatic doom in his voice, spoke words that arrested her pen.
sentences.cn: 广播员的洪亮清晰和富有感情的声音, 使她不由得停下笔.

sentences.en: The announcer apologised for the delay.
sentences.cn: 播报员就晚点表示歉意。

sentences.en: The announcer asked listeners to guess where he was speaking from.
sentences.cn: 节目主持人要听众们猜他是在什么地方说话的.

sentences.en: The announcer gabbled some incomprehensible message over the public address system.
sentences.cn: 播音员透过有线广播叽哩咕噜地说了一些难懂的讯息.

sentences.en: The announcer gave out that the 3:30 train to Manchester would start from Platform 4.
sentences.cn: 播音员通知:三点三十分开往曼彻斯特的火车将从4号站台发车.

sentences.en: The announcer interrupted the radio music to give a special piece of news.
sentences.cn: 播音员停止播放音乐,开始播发一条重要新闻.

sentences.en: The announcer is signing off for tonight.
sentences.cn: 广播员宣告今晚广播结束.

sentences.en: The announcer knocked on the microphone to inform the performers.
sentences.cn: 那报幕员敲击麦克风来通知表演者们.

sentences.en: The announcer read out this budget of disaster with that BBC calm.
sentences.cn: 广播员宣布这一系列倒霉消息时,用的是英国广播公司的镇静口吻.

sentences.en: The announcer's voice brought Holden out of his reverie.
sentences.cn: 播音员的声音将霍尔登从幻想中惊醒。

sentences.en: The radio announcer said " It's time to sign off for the day ; listen again tomorrow. "
sentences.cn: 电台播音员说: “ 本台 全天 播音完毕,请明天再收听. ”

sentences.en: The radio announcer said it was nine o'clock.
This is your favorite announcer signing off for tonight.
sentences.cn: 这是你最喜欢的播音员在结束今晚的广播.

trans.tran_en: someone who gives information to people using a  loudspeaker  or  microphone  , especially at an airport or railway station
